      • openConnection

        public static void openConnection()

      • login

        public static boolean login​(java.lang.String loginUserName,
                            java.lang.String loginPassword)
        Checks if user input User ID and Password match user in the database. Only User 1 is valid. Outputs user provided User ID, Date, Time, and if login was successful to login_activity.txt.
        Returns:
        true if input matches User 1, otherwise false.
